ticket.title: application name non-trivial to alter
ticket.original-body:
currently the application name is generated in seven different places making it non-trivial to update.
@@@ % grep -Rn MyApp * config/application.rb:8:module MyApp config/environment.rb:5:MyApp::Application.initialize! config/environments/development.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/environments/production.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/environments/test.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/routes.rb:1:MyApp::Application.routes.draw do |map| config.ru:4:run MyApp::Application @@@
could this be updated to DRY?
ticket.latest-body:
currently the application name is generated in seven different places making it non-trivial to update.
@@@ % grep -Rn MyApp * config/application.rb:8:module MyApp config/environment.rb:5:MyApp::Application.initialize! config/environments/development.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/environments/production.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/environments/test.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/routes.rb:1:MyApp::Application.routes.draw do |map| config.ru:4:run MyApp::Application @@@
could this be updated to DRY?
ticket.original-body-html:
currently the application name is generated in seven different places making it non-trivial to update.

% grep -Rn MyApp * 
config/application.rb:8:module MyApp
config/environment.rb:5:MyApp::Application.initialize!
config/environments/development.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do
config/environments/production.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do
config/environments/test.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do
config/routes.rb:1:MyApp::Application.routes.draw do |map|
config.ru:4:run MyApp::Application

could this be updated to DRY?

version.body:
currently the application name is generated in seven different places making it non-trivial to update.
@@@ % grep -Rn MyApp * config/application.rb:8:module MyApp config/environment.rb:5:MyApp::Application.initialize! config/environments/development.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/environments/production.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/environments/test.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do config/routes.rb:1:MyApp::Application.routes.draw do |map| config.ru:4:run MyApp::Application @@@
could this be updated to DRY?
version.body-html:
currently the application name is generated in seven different places making it non-trivial to update.

% grep -Rn MyApp * 
config/application.rb:8:module MyApp
config/environment.rb:5:MyApp::Application.initialize!
config/environments/development.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do
config/environments/production.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do
config/environments/test.rb:1:MyApp::Application.configure do
config/routes.rb:1:MyApp::Application.routes.draw do |map|
config.ru:4:run MyApp::Application

could this be updated to DRY?
version.title: application name non-trivial to alter

version.body:
This would be nice to have. Something like:
rails rename my_awesome_app_name
:)
version.body-html:
This would be nice to have. Something like:

rails rename my_awesome_app_name

:)
version.title: application name non-trivial to alter

version.body: Sorry, but after some discussion in the mailing group, it comes to the conclusion that this feature won't be added to core.
version.body-html: Sorry, but after some discussion in the mailing group, it comes to the conclusion that this feature won't be added to core.
version.title: application name non-trivial to alter
